{"id":426092633,"lang":"python3","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1606835824,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"144 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/426092633/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"17.7 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        if not grid or not grid[0]:\n            return 0\n        ans = 0\n        rowlen = len(grid)\n        colen = len(grid[0])\n        \n        seen = {}\n        def search(r, c):\n            isValid = 0 <= r < rowlen and 0 <= c < colen and (r, c) not in seen and grid[r][c] == 1\n            if isValid:\n                seen[(r, c)] = True\n                res =  1 + search(r + 1, c) + search(r - 1, c) + search(r, c + 1) + search(r, c - 1)\n                return res\n            return 0\n            \n        \n        for r in range(rowlen):\n            for c in range(colen):\n                if (r, c) not in seen and grid[r][c] == 1:\n                    ans = max(search(r, c), ans)\n        return ans\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
